entities.label: United Nations Interim Administration Mission in Kosovo
Article 344 of the Provisional Criminal Code of Kosovo

edges.label: 1. Investigation Conducted By
edges.tooltip: UNMIK is conducting the investigation into the bribery allegations.

edges.label: 2. Investigation Target
edges.tooltip: The investigation focuses on alleged bribery at Pristina Airport.

edges.label: 3. Involvement in Allegation
edges.tooltip: PEAP is involved in the bribery allegation as the location where the envelope was found.

edges.label: 4. Interview Conducted
edges.tooltip: KTA Procurement Specialist was interviewed as part of the investigation.

edges.label: 5. Alleged Bribery Connection
edges.tooltip: Company 1 is allegedly linked to the bribery through a procurement contract.

edges.label: 6. Reported Incident
edges.tooltip: The Divisional Manager reported the bribery incident to UNMIK Police.

edges.label: 7. Alleged Recipient
edges.tooltip: The PEAP Official is alleged to have been the target of the bribery attempt.

edges.label: 8. Possible Violation
edges.tooltip: The investigation involves a possible violation of Article 344 due to attempted bribery.

Company 1: Linked to the bribery through securing a procurement contract.
PEAP Official: Alleged target of the bribery attempt involving €5200.

Article 344: Possible violation due to attempted bribery and corruption.
